name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast
display_help: Ice Blast allows you to use the power of ice against your foes, with a tendency to Slow their attacks and movement.

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast.Ice_Bolt
powers.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -25.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target
-25.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 6s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast.Ice_Blast
powers.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -25.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 10s on target
-25.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 10s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast.Frost_Breath
powers.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 2 ticks of 25.30 cold damage over 0.6s on target
2 ticks of 37.98 cold damage over 0.6s on target
-25.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 10s on target
-25.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 10s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast.Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 50.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast.Freeze_Ray
powers.display_help: Freeze Ray encases your foe in a block of ice, holding them helpless in place for a while. While frozen, your foe will take Cold damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 11 ticks of 7.23 cold damage over 2s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 10s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 10s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast.Freezing_Rain
powers.display_help: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), Foe -Recharge, -SPD

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast.Bitter_Ice_Blast
powers.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -25.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 12s on target
-25.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 12s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast.Bitter_Freeze_Ray
powers.display_help: This power can Hold your opponent frozen solid in a block of ice. The victim can be attacked and will remain frozen and helpless. After the ice thaws, the victim emerges chilled and Slowed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -25.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 18s on target
-25.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 18s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 10s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 10s on target

powers.name: Defender_Ranged.Ice_Blast.Blizzard
powers.display_help: You can conjure a Blizzard that inflicts Extreme Cold and Lethal damage over time and can Slow the attack rate of all your opponents in a large area, reducing their chance to hit and possibly knocking them back. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Extreme DoT(Cold), Foe -To Hit, -SPD, -Recharge, Knockback
